Text: Thank YouJust wanted to thank you for your time the other night at the University of Houstons info session I am sure that you met a lot of people but I was the one who was hired by Enron Middle East last year As I had mentioned that Rick had moved his division to Dubai and therefore unfortunately I had to let go of Enrons offer I am extremely interested in joining the Associate program I have an MBA in International Business and Management I am currently working in the Lending department at Southwest Bank of Texas I am enclosing my resume for your review I have applied through the University Career Services as well I look forward to seeing you again in the near future Thanks Nadia
